title: Automated Classification of First-Trimester Fetal Heart Views Using Ultrasound-Specific Self-Supervised Learning
dimension: Behavioral Metrics for Secure AI Tool Usage
summary: Congenital heart disease remains the most common congenital anomaly and a leading cause of neonatal morbidity and mortality.
